name: All Rat Remains
description:
You are a very hungry lab rat, all alone in an empty lab. What happened here?

In mazes, find and chew through wires to deactivate the lasers blocking your way to the next vent. In puzzle rooms, listen to tape recordings for hints to help you figure out the mystery of the lab and make your escape.

WASD/Arrow Keys to move.

Space to dash into vents, over gaps, and break open loose walls/panels.

E to interact with tape recorders and other objects.

Y to squeak.
